name: Smart
description: Gotta share everything? Here's more-than-enough high speed data that lets you say it with words and pictures. Power up your phone and share away!

name: Pro
description: Inseparable from your device? Here's to all the talking, messaging, surfing, streaming and gaming you do. Be sure your phone is fully charged.

name: Tablet
description: Take your tablet everywhere? Enough data to keep you in-the-know-on-the-go.

name: Basic
description: Chat much? All the talk and text you'll ever need and enough high speed data to stay in touch. Go ahead, chat away!
